definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
to manage with difficulty/only just getting by/in a difficult position

sentences.english: And you don't want to stutter and stammer.
sentences.chinese: 而你又不想結結巴巴地說。

sentences.english: With Meher Baba's great love in our hearts, external disasters can't harm us.
sentences.chinese: 有美赫巴巴之大戀愛藏在內心中，無外災可傷害。

sentences.english: I stuttered when reciting the text today, so he criticized me directly.
sentences.chinese: 我今天背課文時磕磕巴巴的，他直衝我刮鼻子。

sentences.english: This will give Yahoo direct and indirect ownership of 37 per cent of Alibaba.com.
sentences.chinese: 此舉將令雅虎直接和間接持有阿里巴巴37%的股權。

sentences.english: Barbara agreed to conduct the meeting pending the election of a permanent chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉同意主持那個會議直到選舉出常務主席。

sentences.english: The children were ey(e)ing the sweets.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們正眼巴巴地盯着糖果。

sentences.english: He tossed over, as he spoke, a crumpled sheet of foreign notepaper.
sentences.chinese: 說話間，他把一張皺巴巴的外國紙片扔了過來。

sentences.english: Mbabane is the capital and the largest city.
sentences.chinese: 姆巴巴納是其首都及最大城市。

sentences.english: Please do not use as blurred eyes of looked at me piteously .
sentences.chinese: 請你不要用那樣迷離的眼神可憐巴巴的看着我。

sentences.english: Then, reaching under his pillow, he pulled out some more crumpled up bills.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他伸手到枕頭下摸出幾張皺皺巴巴的鈔票。

sentences.english: Walking around all wrinkled and creased sends a message of laziness.
sentences.chinese: 穿着皺皺巴巴的衣服，說明你很懶。

sentences.english: Barbara came a cropper when her business failed.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴拉破產了，她栽了個大跟頭。

sentences.english: She stumbled over the long word .
sentences.chinese: 她結結巴巴地說那個長詞。

sentences.english: Taobao is run bye-commerce powerhouse Alibaba. com.
sentences.chinese: 淘寶網是由電子商務阿里巴巴網站運作的。

sentences.english: One man lighted a crack pipe, inhaling deeply.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子點燃皺巴巴的香菸，深深地吸着。

definition: joyfully satisfied/to be immensely proud of oneself/proudly/an air of complacency
happy and excited (idiom)/in high spirits/in great delight
